flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
name: Undertaker
howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
